subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Signal isolation interface units must isolate any low voltage connected to the smoke alarms from the local fire indicator panel.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Signal isolation interface units must be certified by an Accredited Testing Laboratory as compatible with the specific types of smoke alarms used in the system.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Signal isolation interface units must be accepted by the electricity supply authority.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Units must be marked in a clearly visible location, with letters greater than or equal to 35 mm containing the following information:
